title: Sound On: J&J Pause, Afghanistan, China
itunes:title: Sound On: J&J Pause, Afghanistan, China
description:
Bloomberg politics contributors Jeanne Sheehan Zaino and Rick Davis deliver insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: Dr. Jonathan Javitt, CEO of NeuroRx and adjunct professor at Johns Hopkins School of Medicine, and John Sitilides, geopolitical strategist at Trilogy Advisors and diplomacy consultant to the U.S. Department of State.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
